bug.author: alexcg1
bug.summary: Giving thanks to all our contributors! ðŸŽ‰
bug.description:
Thanksgiving is here, and (even though not many of us are American and won't be chowing down on turkey ðŸ¦ƒ), we'd love to take this time to thank all our amazing contributors. Jina wouldn't be what it is without you. If times were less crazy we'd try to get together with you all and buy you a drink of your choice. But since most folks are stuck inside, we've put together a personalized banner for you instead, with your name and your picture in our heart (awwwwww). <denchmark-h:h3>Get Your Banner</denchmark-h>
Just go to jina.ai/thanksgiving/<your_github_username> to download and share your banner. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/jina-ai/_homepage/blob/master/thanksgiving/sample.gif?raw=true></denchmark-link>
Once again, thanks so much for your contribution. Whether it's code, docs, graphics, or something else entirely, we super appreciate it! <denchmark-h:h3>ðŸŽ‰ðŸŽ‰ Happy Thanksgiving! ðŸŽ‰ðŸŽ‰</denchmark-h>
